Articles.Content:
So I was driving the DRN up a mountain when i accidentally pressed the reset button on my power strip. So I turned my computer back on and was greeted with this error:

Does this mean the save is broken? Can I fix it?

Mod List:

Spoiler

Astronomer's Visual Pack

AVP 4k Textures

AT Utils

B9- Legacy Parts

B9 Parts Pack

The persistent.sfs is probably corrupted.  There should be a backup folder inside the save folder.  Rename your current persistent.sfs file something else, then pull the most recent backup out of it's folder into the save's folder, and rename it to persistent.sfs and try again.

Might set you back a little bit, but better than losing the whole thing.
